body_text:
Why does Kasumigaoka call Tomoya "Mr. Ethical"? In Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend, Kasumigaoka always calls Tomoya "Mr. Ethical" (倫理{りんり}君{くん}).
Where did this come from? Is it explained at some point in the original source material?
Feel free to spoil it for me.

Why does Kasumigaoka get attracted to Tomoya? In Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend,
I don't understand how she is attracted to him? well she loves to flirt with him and make the other girls jealous on purpose.
Feel free to spoil it for me.
